title: Ticket #7873: Convert Blahp scripts to Python 3
description: Many Blahp scripts are currently Python 2 so any EL 8 users are in for a rude surprise if they try to use grid universe batch jobs (either locally or via Bosco). Let's get them converted to over Python 3 if we want this for 8.9-only, or Python 2/3 if we want to backport this to 8.8
remarks:
2020-Oct-02 16:11:40 by blin:
Oops, I missed that this was actually already done (https://github.com/htcondor/BLAH/pull/7)! Sorry for the noise.
creator: blin
